title: tuNai vErillaiyE
sahitya:
tuNai vErillaiyE unnaippOl enakku iNai vErillAmal irakkamuru murugA


anupallavi

  taNikai malai mEvum dInadayALanE unaip-paNindiDuvOrai aNaittiDum ayyanE


caraNam    tinai aLavEnum un daya vinai Indoru aNuvaLavEnum en vinai ennai aNugAmal
anudinamum aDiyEn unadaDiyai manadil ninaindurugi nADum nalamelAm peravE
